code:
flowchart LR
    Experiment["Experiment\n(Random Trial)"] -->|"outcomes"| SampleSpace

    %% Create a circular sample space with elliptical events
    subgraph SampleSpace["Sample Space (Ω)"]
        direction TB
        EventA["Event A"]
        EventB["Event B"] 
        EventC["Event C"]
    end
    
    %% Map from events to probability law
    SampleSpace --> EventA
    SampleSpace --> EventB
    SampleSpace --> EventC
    
    EventA --> ProbLaw["Probability Law\n(P: Events → [0,1])"]
    EventB --> ProbLaw
    EventC --> ProbLaw
    
    %% Show bar graph representation
    ProbLaw --> BarChart

    subgraph BarChart["Probability Distribution"]
        direction TB
        BarTitle["P(Event)"]
        BarGraph[" 
        1.0 |                                 
        0.9 |                                 
        0.8 |                                 
        0.7 |    ███████                  
        0.6 |    ███████                  
        0.5 |    ███████    ███████        
        0.4 |    ███████    ███████        
        0.3 |    ███████    ███████    ███████
        0.2 |    ███████    ███████    ███████
        0.1 |    ███████    ███████    ███████
        0.0 +----███████----███████----███████----
              P(Event A)  P(Event B)  P(Event C)
              P = 0.7     P = 0.5     P = 0.3
        "]
    end
    
    %% Styling
    style Experiment fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    style SampleSpace fill:#e8f4ff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px,rx:60,ry:60,color:#000
    style EventA fill:#dfd,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,rx:30,ry:20,color:#000
    style EventB fill:#ddf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,rx:30,ry:20,color:#000
    style EventC fill:#fdd,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,rx:30,ry:20,color:#000
    style ProbLaw fill:#fbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    style BarChart fill:#ffe,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,stroke-dasharray:5 5,color:#000
    style BarTitle fill:none,stroke:none,color:#000
    style BarGraph fill:none,stroke:none,font-family:monospace,color:#000
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
